sentences.sContent: Bold lipstick and bawdy dancing are the trademarks of Nida Chaudhry, who performs to packed houses at Lahore's Al Falah theater.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bold lipstick and bawdy dancing are the trademarks of Nida Chaudhry, who performs to packed houses at Lahore's Al Falah theater.
sentences.sCn: 大胆的口红和下流的舞蹈是奈达·乔杜里的招牌特征。 她在拉合尔阿尔法拉剧院的演出场场爆满。
